summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 5.1°C) and feels like temperature (down 3.6°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), dew point temperature (up 4.2°C), feels like temperature (up 2.9°C), and outside temperature (up 4.4°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; extreme heat is expected, potentially dangerous in the sun. Also, humidity should not be a concern and moderately breezy. Chance of light rain, occasional overcast conditions, and strong and powerful sunlight. The weather will likely remain the same.
